body_html: Does someone have a way to build tensorflow-gpu for centOS and cuda 9.2. My cluster admin has updated driver and removed cuda 9.0 i can not fin anything for cuda 9.2 and CENTOS Linux. If anyone can make one or have a clue please let me know. Thank you :(
